projects.title: Ally: AI Parenting Coach
projects.long-desc:
Healthy Digital Childhood Alliance approached us to help them create an AI-powered chatbot to help parents practice difficult conversations with their children and develop a functional and educational website around it.

We developed Ally - a chatbot based on current, evidence-based research in Positive Discipline and Systemic Family Therapy. Ally is custom built to client specification, designed to give parents and caregivers research-based guidance for childhood digital wellbeing challenges.

We also developed additional functionalities on the HDCA site, including user registration, analytics, and resource download tracking.
projects.client: Healthy Digital Childhood Alliance (HDCA) is a Lisbon based non-profit that aims to build communities where parents and educators can come together to seek ways to allow children to ‚Äúthrive, not just survive, in our digital age‚Äù.

projects.title: Memememememe
projects.long-desc:
We designed and deployed the digital interface for Adnan Aga's Narrative Laundry in the Media Majlis Museum at Northwestern Qatar.

The exhibit showcases the social power of memes in modern history.

Taking inspiration from the aesthetics of Windows 95, the audiovisual experience includes animated images, a very realistic voiceover by Gilbert Gottfried, live captions, and original background music.

projects.title: Sarcasmophone
projects.long-desc:
We created a handheld device that turns everything you say sarcastic. üôÑ

Loosely inspired by that one scene in Inside Out 2, speak into this megaphone and let it add saltiness and judgement to your delivery.

This project is powered by a Raspberry Pi and two custom voice models trained on painstakingly recorded sarcastic audio by Tres and Josh. (One of us might be better at voice acting than the other...)

We definitely didn't run into any issues with this one! /s

tres.name: tres pimentel
tres.bio: The original Fish-Boy hailing from Jupiter, FL. Retired from a boring career in consulting, Tres has a Masters in Data Science and another Masters in Interactive Telecommunications. Ask him about hardware prototyping and machine learning.

josh.name: josh zhong
josh.bio: The kid wonder from Auckland, Down Under. Josh couldn't make it as a pop star so he thought he would be an inter-disciplinary designer instead. This kiwi might be able to do it all, especially fabrication, web development, and making videos that go viral.

drafts.title: The Love Oracle
drafts.short-desc: AI encyclopedia for video oral history
drafts.long-desc: What if you could ask questions to oral history? A new way to engage with video archives through RAG models and speculative design of public knowledge infrastructure. Using technology to archive, present, and educate. To make broad static media interactive and personal.
